So I have a chunk of information to lay on you guys now considering I haven't posted again in like 2 f'in weeks.

We will start, like most other posts with a run down of the most current going backwards.  Hey, you gotta blog about what is freshest in your memory!

Saturday night I text message Jenni to see what she has planned for that Sunday-hey I don't make plans in advance well-I normally forget about them or double book myself so tight I can't make it to the second one even if it is the most important event.  She was like-well I will be studying but then after while I will need a study break-hmmm ok sounds good I say.  Well I devise a plan to go her house to watch The L Word and have a few beers.  Nothing major-considering Sunday is my usual drinking day anyways, so I figure we will watch a disc of the first season-drink the 8 beers I brought over, and then I would just go home.  Topher is in Michigan for business so I don't want to get too wasted because I can't spend the night on his apartment floor.  Well we drink the beers I bring over, and then the ones she has in her frig, and then a bottle of wine, and then another half of bottle.  Needless to say, I am pretty wasted.  Don't get me wrong I can handle my own but damn!  So she was like you can stay here, it's not a big deal, I mean I have a spare room with a nice bed in it, which is better than what you have at home even *I told her about how I sleep on a couch at home because I don't have a bed*.  So we go upstairs-and I have been through her house before so I know where the spare bedroom is so I go in and try and find the light switch, but I can't so I just lay down-who needs a light on when they sleep anyways-well most of the time I do but I was just going to deal.  Then Jenni came in and was like you know what-these sheets haven't been changed since my brother and his girlfriend were here-I don't know if you want to sleep on them.  I was like it's ok-better than going down to sleep on the sofa, and she was like well you can sleep with me in my bed.  I think to myself-well I am wasted and it's not like anything is going to happen she told Topher that all she wants is to be my friend so I decide, what could it hurt.  I don't normally sleep with anyone so I tell her that I am a cover hog, she said she doesn't mind.  So whatever...We go lay down and the next thing I know her feet are intertwined with mine-she's "cold"...whatever.  Well then her leg was inbetween mine....hmmm this one is harder to explain, but not as hard as things that followed later.  Well when I finally shut my eyes for the last time its like 7:30am, and I know that she has to be up at like 11am to get ready for work.  Oh well all I had to do that day was be around for the kids so it didn't matter to me...I'm a horrible person!

Ok, now let's rewind to two Sundays ago-I went apple picking with Topher-we had a blast.  Note to all people out there:  Topher and I are evil when put together when we haven't seen each other in appx. a week.  Needless to say we weren't the typical apple orchard goers.  We didn't know what kind of apples we wanted, we demanded service even though there was a line, we were acting extremely under our ages.  But dang it all we had fun!  Then Jenni and I had movie plans, so we went to see Elizabethtown.  It was pretty good actually-I was a bit leary but I went along anyways.  You should have seen her face when I enacted the one seat rule.  She was like umm...are you kidding me, it feels like you are so far away.  I don't want to have to yell to talk to you, but I held my ground and sat my one seat away.  For those of you who have been to a movie with me you know how difficult it is for me to sit next to you.  After the movie, we called Topher because I like hanging out with him and she is starting to come around to the testosterone influence.  But as we were sitting there, listening to the same songs being done by the same people, Jenni came up with the idea that we should go to the cities righ then and there and go dancing.  This is why I like her so much.  She is completely spontaneous but yet always has a plan.  So we drive to the cities, drink some extremely strong drinks and then get back in the car at bar time and drive home.  It rains the entire way home-I personally hate driving in the rain so I don't want to talk too much and distract Jenni, but I want to keep her awake so we have blurps of conversation the entire way home while Topher is sawing logs in the backseat.  Literally snoring so loud that it made the rain hitting the window seem quiet!!!  So we got back to Eau Claire and I got a hug from Jenni and then went to Topher's to sleep off the night.

That's about it for excitement in my life-well besides the fact that I almost sent a guy to jail this past week because he was being a pain in my ass at work.  After that you should have seen the guy's attitudes turn around.  They think that I am just this push over that won't yell or send anyone to jail.  Ummm, hello I have sent a guy to jail already what makes you think that the second time will be any harder than the first!?!


Well...I will blog again soon-hopefully fun things happen over Halloween!!!

The daughter from "The Gilmore Girls" is one of the girls, one of the girls is from the movie "Thirteen", and I know I have seen one of the other girls in a movie too but irregardless, it is a must see!  Just be prepared, that means have tissues out.  If you don't cry during this movie there is something very wrong with you!

HAHAHA-I totally missed one of the best stories that happened between my last two posts.  

Stephanie and I were talking and she mentioned that one of her classes was suppose to have a couple of people in wheelchairs come in and give a presentation, and be present for questions from the class.  Well we started talking and I was like if Alex aka #3 is there you should ask him a question.  And then Stephanie comes up with not just a question, but an awesome question, something along the lines of "So, you being in a chair, that makes it ok for you to be an asshole?"  I thought this was super funny considering he is somewhat of a giant asshole-some days.  Well I was talking to him a night that weekend, and I casually bring up the question of whether or not he had given any presentations that week.  He is dumbfounded so I know that he hasn't, and tell him the story of Stephanie being in one of the classes and how we were kind of joking about how she was going to ask him a question-without of course telling him what the question was because that would just be rude.  But he comes back with this plain old retard response-"Is that all I am to you, a joke?"  I was so taken aback by this question that I actually laughed out loud!  Was he kidding me?  Did actually not remember that all we ever were or ever will be is something that is open for joking and ridicule?  Come on, it's nothing.  

Dumb boys-Honestly!!!

Aggghhhhh, it's been a month almost, or so it seems!  I survived my 6 day stretch.  I am glad to say that it was worth it, I got that next weekend off-something I haven't had in a long time.  It was much needed, almost as much as a retail therapy trip is due :).  I spent my weekend off down in Madison, I drove my dad to work one day, so we got to spend some time together.  Then, Friday night I hung out with my step-mom.  We actually had a good time-we went for a fish fry, and had a bucket of shorties apiece.  Wow, I hadn't drank just beer in a long time so I was 5 sheets to the wind, even though it was probably only like 8pm.  AWESOME start to the weekend!!!  Then Saturday night-yes the night of the Badgers game against Michigan *who by the way we hadn't beaten in something like 16 games*-I watched the end of the game at a liquor store with Stephanie.  We went back to the house and slammed, and I mean slammed a sixer, 2 bottles of wine and then went to the bars.  My step-mom drove us down there, and was like don't call when you need a ride home, which was fine!  Long story shorten considerably-Stephanie and I hung out all night, we went to Bull Feathers, and Shamrock *the downtown gay bar*, and then to The Pub.  At The Pub is where the night turns from great to fabolous.  This guy literally pushes Stephanie out of his way, and "doesn't" realize it until I give him a dirty look.  Well then he and his hot, and I mean HOTT!!! friend buy both of us a shot.  The one who ran Stephanie out of the way automatically starts hitting on her, and the HOTT!!! one and I strike up a conversation just because our friends are talking.  Well bar time comes and they offer to find us a cab, because we came from the North side, and even though my dad walks it, I refuse to in my little kitten heals *which I admit were the stupidest choice of footwear ever!*.  So, Brian-the guy that Stephanie was talking to-and Stephanie are leading the way, trying to find a cab for us.  Well Brian decides that he is just going to run out in front of cars that he thinks are cabs, and narrowly misses getting creamed by a Topper's delivery truck.  Mean while the HOTT!!! guy that I am talking to-his name is Pete or Peter depending on what I screamed out...anyways I digress-is walking along with his arm around my shoulder, and holding onto my purse strap so it won't slip off.  I was so smitten with this guy it wasn't funny!  Well the end of the cab ride home story is that Brian ends up giving a cabbie a 75 dollar tip just to take us home...yes his total charge was for 100 bucks!!!  Agghh, I can't spend that much on anything let alone getting strangers home.  Well I am sure he thought he was going to be greatly rewarded.  But my step-mom-who when is drunk sleeps really soundly-woke up and saw me with a guy on the new couch and asked who was the boy.  I was like which one-she didn't find this very funny!  I on the other hand thought it was a witty retort.  She later said that we were to strip our own beds and wash the linens.  Oh, well what are you going to do?  Over all it was well worth everything I had to do the next day in  my hung over state!

So Sunday, in the midst of my hangover I go to have lunch with Adrian-a girl that I truly think is an awesome person, and used to work with at the most laid back job ever Steck's.  Hanging out with her on her LSATs prep. lunch break was exactly what I needed, I needed to tell my stories from the night before and hear what was going on in Whitewater from her perspective.

Ummm, not much else has happened since then.  I do the typical go out on Sunday night with Topher and his new guy, we call him Porkie.  They are so cute together!  But as of just this weekend Topher is getting tired of him always being at the apartment, and just being generally agreeable.  

Also this week-Tuesday to be exact-I went out on my first date with Jenni yesterday.  We went to this little local spot that serves Cajun food, and has the best beers on tap.  I was kind of leary about meeting her one-on-one for dinner.  I don't want to say that she is unentertaining, but I want everyone to know that I can be somewhat shy.  Yeah, I know that you don't believe me, but it's the truth, so I was worried about her thinking that of me-or worse yet, think that I was boring.  Well needless to say that we held our own in the converstation department.  She did ask some very interesting questions, that were a little heavy for a first date, but I rolled with the punches and kept her laughing!  Then after dinner-I hadn't bored her too badly because she wanted hang out with me still and grab another drink.  I thought this was the best sign, until she wanted to drive us both to hang out with Topher and some of the people that he works with-that was ultimately the best sign!  I had so much fun hanging out with her when I didn't need to be the center of entertainment, she picked on a guy that was 30 with 2 degrees that works selling phones.  She found his lack of drive pretty interesting considering she is an executive at a local factory, is going to school for her masters, and owns her own house.  And little did I mention lives no where near her family.  I truly dig her ability to just move away and be independent!  All-in-all I am pretty interested to see what her faults are.  We are planning an L-Word marathon sometime in the near future because she says that I need to watch it.  I was like ok-I'm down for whatever!  She also reintroduced me to Ani DiFranco-Solare must be given credit for the initial introduction, but I never really got into it.  Jenni said that she is really good and then sat in the car and played me her fav. songs and they were really good, so today I dl'ed a bunch of them and burnt myself a cd.

*Sigh*  I am finally done, I think, well, yeah I am pretty sure that's all I can blog about today.

Yes, that's right, I am working 6 nights in a row.  Yes, I will die by day 4.  I don't know what made me take the extra hours, I must have been wasted :).

Oh, well what are you going to do?  I know, not care, and rake in the extra money!!!!

So...Sunday night...I went to the gay bar, like always, and I met this person that I have been emailing for like a month now.  This person is pretty cool, but then they start to ignore me.  I was like that's cool...it's the first time they have been to this gay bar, and they are meeting the people!  Cool I get to help them meet new people, score extra brownie points for me.  Apparently not, apparently I am just this person that you meet, screw around with and then don't call or email for the better part of a week.  I don't know how to take this...I think that I am mad, but secretly, I wish that this person would just freaking call me!

Then, Monday night I took my mom to see The 40 Year Old Virgin.  I had to laugh out loud at a couple parts, because they hit home alittle too hard.

Then Tuesday, I went to Eau Claire and chilled with Topher for a while, and then by like 10:30-11:00pm, I was ready to go to the bar.  I can only handle so much hanging out with him without someone else around apparently.  Not that I don't love him, because I do!  So we walk in the gay bar, and of course I talk to almost half of the people because I know them, but the hot bartender who I would have sex with until my vagina fell out, was there and he was wasted.  I mean...WASTED!!!  He and I talked for a while and then he asked me how open I was.  I was like, huh?  He was like, well if I go like this *as he puts his hands from around the back of me unto my boobs* would you be offended?  I was like no, go ahead you are already there :D.  I couldn't stop laughing.  I can't wait to see him the next time I go the bar, I will be giving him shit!!!

That's it...work, movie, drinking...that's what my life consists of this week.  Sadly it's almost all work right now!
